items.name: Rotten Strawberry
items.description: The mold gives it a fuzzy texture.

items.name: Rags
items.description: A bundle of clean-ish rags to stop the bleeding with.

items.name: Bandage
items.description: A sterilized bandage meant to be applied to wounds.

items.name: First Aid Kit
items.description: A sterilized set of surgical tools & bandages to treat any serious injury.

items.name: Strange concoction
items.description: A foul smelling concoction that glows orange.

items.name: Mutated meat
items.description: Pulsating meat that was harvested from something (or someone) mutated by eldritch forces.

items.name: Eye of the Idiot God
items.description: Gelatinous black eyeball. It smells like death.

items.name: Black Apple
items.description: Pitch black apple, it absorbs all light.

items.name: God skin jerky
items.description: Hard & crunchy. Fills you with power.

items.name: Bone flavoured ice cream
items.description: Ice cream made with the ground up bones of the dead.

items.name: Bottled madness
items.description: bottled scream of a mad god.

items.name: Acidic grease
items.description: grease that corrodes any living flesh it touches.

items.name: Abyssal Eel entrails
items.description: Jar of Abyssal Eel entrails, salted for conservation.

items.name: Golden Strawberry
items.description: A Juicy strawberry with a peculiar golden color.

items.name: God Emperor's blessing
items.description: A radiant gem that is warm to the touch. 'Ad Astra per Aspera' is carved on it.'

items.name: Happy Pills
items.description: Grey, metallic looking pills. They make you feel a bit less depressed when ingested.

items.name: Shrooma
items.description: A flask containing a potent juice made from hallucinogenic mushrooms.
